column4: Samba is a better protocol for file sharing. use the Places->Network Servers and you should see your machine there

I know samba is better, but im encountering this problem with samba http://www.clarkconnect.com/forums/showflat.php?Cat=0&Board=cc42&Number=99784&Searchpage=1&Main=99746&Words=samba+performance&topic=&Search=true#Post9978
basically read speeds are deadly, but writes speeds are fast over samba
my knowledge of Samba performance issues aren't great, so i probably can't help you. the only thing i can offer is make sure you've disabled ipv6, as this fixed Samba performance issues for me
